detailed_results.story_text: Once upon a time, in a cozy little village nestled beside a sparkling river, lived a tiny mouse named Millie.  Millie wasn't just any mouse; she had fur the color of warm honey and eyes that twinkled like tiny stars.  Even though she was small, Millie had a spirit as big as the tallest oak tree.

suggested_content.title: The Brave Little Mouse
suggested_content.content: A small mouse lived in a big house. One day, he helped his family by being very brave and clever. Everyone was proud of him and celebrated his courage!

detailed_results.story_text:
Okay, here we go! Let's create an awesome story, just for you! ✨

Once upon a time, in a cozy little village nestled beside a sparkling blue lake, lived a fluffy, ginger cat named Marmalade.  🧡 Marmalade wasn't just any cat; oh no, he had the fluffiest tail you'd ever seen, like a giant feather duster! He also had bright green eyes that sparkled like emeralds, and he loved nothing more than chasing butterflies in the meadow.  Marmalade was a very curious cat, always sniffing around and getting into little bits of mischief, but he had a very big heart.
